title: Treasures of the earth
brief_description: Illustrates the physical prosesses that produce concentrations of mineral ores beneath the Earth’s crust. Animated demonstrations of fundamental geological principles are shown. Correlated with “Health Elementary Science” by Herman and Nina Schneider.
